description: ORDER The "Motion of the Ultra Petroleum Investor Group for Consolidation of the Actions, Appointment as Lead Plaintiff, and Approval of Selection of Lead Counsel" (Doc. # 26 ) is GRANTED; The Bussom v. Watford, et al., action (No. 20-cv-02820-KLM), filed September 17, 2020, is CONSOLIDATED with this action; Ultra Petroleum Investor Group is APPOINTED as lead Plaintiff; The law firms of Levi & Korsinsky, LLP and Bragar Eagel & Squire, P.C. are APPROVED as co- lead counsel and Berens Law LLC is APPROVED as liaison counsel; Altman's and Kuruppasamy's Motions (Docs. # 15 and 22 ) are GRANTED to the extent the seek consolidation and DENIED to the extent they seek appointment as lead plaintiff and lead counsel; The motions filed by Plaintiffs Weber, Mao, and Slaight (Docs. ## 18, 23, 24 ), are GRANTED to the extent the seek consolidation and DENIED to the extent they seek appointment as lead plaintiff and lead counsel; All future filings in these consolidated actions shall be filed in case number 20-cv-2652-CMA-STV using the caption provided, by Judge Christine M. Arguello on 4/29/2021. (evana, ) (Entered: 04/29/2021)
